name: K - New Media GmbH & Co. KG
overview:
The K - New Media GmbH & Co. KG develops and invests in companies doing e-commerce and ventures with similar focus. Our goal is to find dynamic business models, new business areas and innovative technologies. We are an e-commerce incubator, which implements new ideas with highly motivated people and we are an investor which supports existing businesses and business ideas for further growth.

The K - New Media GmbH & Co. KG is a subsidiary of K - Mail Order GmbH & Co. KG, an international mail order company from Pforzheim, Germany. K - New Media has its offices in the center of Berlin at Hackescher Markt, in the heart¬ù of the German start-up scene. Our team of 40 professionals are committed to realize the projects professionally and effectively. Our projects and our investment cases are continuously supported by our expertise in the mail order business, distance trade and multi channeling . We are always looking for new ideas, good contacts and high quality partners to support our team and realize our goals.

relationships.title: Manager of Business Development and Investments
